personalInfo.education: University of Washington; University of San Diego (2008, Communications)

tourBios.carHigh:
In addition to nine starts on PGA TOUR Canada, has made three Web.com Tour starts, dating to 2011.

2013: Made nine starts on PGA TOUR Canada, highlighted by a win at the ATB Financial Classic. Rounds of 68-64-69-70 gave him a two-stroke win over three others.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the 2006 Oregon Duck Invitational medalist. Also finished tied at the 2006 Del Walker Intercollegiate.
tourBios.personal: Played for three Mountain View High School state title teams and earned one individual high school title...Was a personal trainer for a year prior to turning professional and would own his own gym if not for golf as a career...Favorite entertainer is Dave Matthews and favorite book is The Art of Racing in the Rain. Lists his wife's stuffed chicken as his favorite meal...Would most like to trade places for a day with Justin Timberlake...Would round out his dream foursome with his dad, Tiger Woods and Tom Watson...Bucket list includes skiing in Australia and sky diving...Earliest golf memory is of shooting a 73 and beating his dad for the first time...Twitter account name is @joepanzeri.

tourBios.carHigh:
2013: Seven made cuts in nine evets with a win at the ATB Financial Classic and four top 25s. Opened season with T20 at the Times Colonist Island...Scored his second Mackenzie Tour win at the ATB Financial Classic in August with round of 68-64-69-70. Following 36 holes was T1 and then solo first thereafter to win by two strokes with a 17-under 271...Next finish was a T4 at The Great Waterway Classic...Bookend rounds of 67 earned him for 18-under 270...In September, claimed a T18 at the Cape Bretopn Classic.

2012: Best season finish was second at the TOUR Championship and was one of just three players to make the cut in all eight events. 

2011: Won the Dakota Dunes Casino Open, his first Mackenzie Tour victory. Earned full exemption by finishing second at the Florida Winter Qualifying School.

2010: Rocky Mountain PGA Section Assistants' Champion
tourBios.personal: Known for his ability to post very low rounds
tourBios.otherInfo: Has played on the Gateway Tour

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 1st on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T 2 times.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 22nd in Career Money Leaders on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
